name: How to Football
description:
A fun game where you play against an adversary and can drop objects onto the field to spice up the match! This game is supposed to be played by two local players.

Developed for Dev-U Jam #11

Instructions:

W/A/D - Controls P1E - P1 Kicks / Release object from P1's claw

Home/Delete/Pg Down - Controls P1Insert - P2 Kicks / Release object from P12s claw

Credits:

CazadorImperial - Programmer

RenanSerpa - Game Designer

Francisco Magnani - 2D Artist
